and I know how to make one!

Adding or deleting a single character (as in â€˜healthscareâ€™) or changing a syllable slightly (as in â€˜politricksâ€™) brings us closer to a wordâ€™s true meaning.

Iâ€™m convinced the thought that fills my mind most of the time is just a complex of [reactions](reactions.md) to the strange world Iâ€™m living in. Creative [urges](urges-1.md) struggle to redirect my mind to what I donâ€™t see, to what might be. I want to deal with whatâ€™s possible, not wallow is whatâ€™s already taken place and left its ugly mark.
